mapper.select:
select creplyno, cpostNo, userNo, regDate, creplyContent, userName, logoPath from (
SELECT creplyno, cpostNo, r.userNo userNo, regDate, creplyContent, u.userName userName, u.logoPath logoPath
FROM communityreply r join users u on r.userNo = u.userNo ) where cpostNo = #{postNo} order by creplyno ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_creply_no.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO communityreply( creplyno, cpostNo, creplyContent, regDate, userNo) VALUES ( #{creplyno}, #{cpostNo}, #{creplyContent}, sysdate, #{userNo})
